name: Wooden broom
description: In the 15th-18th centuries, thousands of women accused of witchcraft were tortured, sexually abused, and burned at the stake by the Catholic Church. They were often healers and midwives who threatened to educate the uneducated, or women who had too much land, wealth, or influence. Remember the mothers, sisters, and daughters who were punished for simply existing #WitchHunt #Femicide
